Module com.example.c195pa
Package com.example.c195pa.dao

Class customerAccess

java.lang.Object
com.example.c195pa.dao.customerAccess
public class customerAccess extends Object
Class for accessing the customer table and performing CRUD on customer objects

  • Method Details

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> getAllCustomers() throws SQLException
      getAllCustomers gets everything from the customer table, the division and country ID from the first_level_divisons table, and the country from the countries table * to create a customer object. The object is then added to the customersObservableList
      Returns:
      customers observable list
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query

    • updateCustomer

      public static boolean updateCustomer(Integer customerID, String name, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, String country, String division) throws SQLException
      This function attempts to update the customer in the database and returned a boolean based on if the update worked
      Parameters:
      customerID - id of the customer
      name - name of the customer
      address - address of the customer
      postalCode - postal code of the customer
      phoneNumber - phone number of the customer
      country - country of the customer
      division - division of the customer
      Returns:
      boolean whether update customer worked
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurred during the query

    • addCustomer

      public static boolean addCustomer(String name, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, String country, String division) throws SQLException
      This function attempts to add a customer in the database and returned a boolean based on if the add worked
      Parameters:
      name - name of the customer
      address - address of the customer
      postalCode - postal code of the customer
      phoneNumber - phone number of the customer
      country - country of the customer

      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurred during the query

    • deleteCustomer

      public static void deleteCustomer(int customerID, String customerName) throws SQLException
      This function attempts to delete the customer from the database. Validation of if the customer has an appointment occurs in the mainMenuController, and is not needed here
      Parameters:
      customerID - id of the customer
      customerName - cu
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the deletion

    • getDivisionByCountry

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getDivisionByCountry(String country) throws SQLException
      This function attempts to create an observable list of divisions based on the selection of the user for the country
      Parameters:
      country - country seleceted by the user
      Returns:
      observableList of divisions based on the users country selection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query

    • checkForAppointment

      public static int checkForAppointment(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Function that is called before a user is deleted, to confirm they have no appointments
      Parameters:
      customerID - customerID of the customer the user is attempting to delete
      Returns:
      integer representing number of appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query
